name: Moto Patrol Ride
description:
Moto Patrol Ride is amazing racing action games to explore your skills to explore the city and banish all enemies vehicles villain. You should destroy all villain car or motorcycle using rocket or hand which is in front of you! your patrol vehicle can use gun cannon, nitros speed and other power!

After you reach as far as you go ad earn coin as much as you collect, you should open new patrol car that have more power!

Feature
# Lot of amazing moto rider
# Amazing world to explore
# Lot of weapon and power up
# Very good graphic
# Easy to play
